price: 23. (Demikianlah) hukum Allah yang telah berlaku sejak dahulu, kamu sekali-kali tiada akan menemukan perubahan pada hukum Allah itu.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
